_header: Ne thirst man never in land
Note:
Critical edition, Hausknecht (1885)
XHausknecht, Emil. Floris and Blanchfleur.
Sammlung Englischer Denkmäler 5. Berlin: Weidmann, 1885 (1296 lines).

CULGg4272.First Lines:
…Heo tok ferþ a wel fair þingOf hire finger a riche
                    Ryng…
CULGg4272.Last Lines:
…þat we him mote louie soþat we mote to heuene
                    go

BLCottVitDIII.First Lines:
…wiþ þoute wene…þat maide to his
                    quene…
BLCottVitDIII.Last Lines:
…& bereþ him þer…After þes
                    childe…Hem to for berre…Twene…

BLEge2862.First Lines: Ne thirst man neuer in londeAfter feirer Children fonde…
BLEge2862.Last Lines: …Hom he went with royal arrayAnd was crowned with in a short day
BLEge2862.Attributed Title: fflorence & Blaunchefloure (running titles split across openings throughout).

NLS1921.First Lines:
…I ne kan telle ȝou nowtHou richeliche þe sadel was
                    wrout…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Amen siggeȝ al soAnd ich schal helpe ȝou þer
                    to
NLS1921.Note:
861 lines in this MS, imperfect at beginning due to lost
                    folios.
